verses.verse: He commanded <S%H6680><s%> the steward of his house, <S%H1004><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Fill <S%H4390><s%> the men <S%H582><s%>'s sacks <S%H572><s%> with food, <S%H400><s%> as much as <S%H834><s%> they can <S%H3201><s%> carry, <S%H5375><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> each man <S%H376><s%>'s money <S%H3701><s%> in his sack <S%H572><s%>'s mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Put <S%H7760><s%> my cup, <S%H1375><s%> the silver <S%H3701><s%> cup, <S%H1375><s%> in the sack <S%H572><s%>'s mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the youngest, <S%H6996><s%> with his grain <S%H7668><s%> money. <S%H3701><s%>" He did <S%H6213><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> that Joseph <S%H3130><s%> had spoken. <S%H1696><s%>
As soon as the morning <S%H1242><s%> was light, <S%H215><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> were sent away, <S%H7971><s%> they and their donkeys. <S%H2543><s%>

When they had gone out <S%H3318><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and were not yet far off, <S%H7368><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his steward, <S%H1004><s%> "Up, <S%H6965><s%> follow <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the men. <S%H582><s%> When you overtake <S%H5381><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> ask them, <S%H7999><s%> 'Why have you rewarded evil <S%H7451><s%> for good? <S%H2896><s%>
Isn't <S%H113><s%> this that from which my lord drinks, <S%H8354><s%> and by which he indeed <S%H5172><s%> divines? <S%H5172><s%> You have done evil <S%H7489><s%> in so doing. <S%H6213><s%>'"
He overtook <S%H5381><s%> them, <S%H1696><s%> and he spoke these <S%H428><s%> words to them. <S%H1697><s%>

They said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H113><s%> "Why does my lord speak <S%H1696><s%> such words <S%H1697><s%> as these? <S%H2486><s%> Far be it from your servants <S%H5650><s%> that they should do <S%H6213><s%> such a thing! <S%H1697><s%>

Behold, <S%H3701><s%> the money, which we found <S%H4672><s%> in our sacks <S%H572><s%>' mouths, <S%H6310><s%> we brought again <S%H7725><s%> to you out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%> How then should we steal <S%H1589><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> or gold <S%H2091><s%> out of your lord <S%H113><s%>'s house? <S%H1004><s%>
With whomever of your servants <S%H5650><s%> it is found, <S%H4672><s%> let him die, <S%H4191><s%> and we also will be my lord <S%H113><s%>'s bondservants. <S%H5650><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "Now also let it be according to your words: <S%H3651><s%> he with whom it is found <S%H4672><s%> will be my bondservant; <S%H5650><s%> and you will be blameless. <S%H5355><s%>"

Then they hurried, <S%H4116><s%> and each man <S%H376><s%> took his sack <S%H572><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the ground, <S%H776><s%> and each man <S%H376><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> his sack. <S%H572><s%>

He searched, <S%H2664><s%> beginning <S%H2490><s%> with the eldest, <S%H1419><s%> and ending <S%H3615><s%> at the youngest. <S%H6996><s%> The cup <S%H1375><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> in Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>'s sack. <S%H572><s%>
Then they tore <S%H7167><s%> their clothes, <S%H8071><s%> and each man <S%H376><s%> loaded <S%H6006><s%> his donkey, <S%H2543><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> to the city. <S%H5892><s%>

Judah <S%H3063><s%> and his brothers <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Joseph <S%H3130><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> and he was still there. <S%H5307><s%> They fell on the ground <S%H776><s%> before him. <S%H6440><s%>

Joseph <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H4639><s%> "What deed is this that you have done? <S%H6213><s%> Don't <S%H3045><s%> you know that such a man <S%H376><s%> as I can indeed divine? <S%H5172><s%>"

Judah <S%H3063><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "What will we tell my lord? <S%H113><s%> What will we speak? <S%H1696><s%> Or how will we clear ourselves? <S%H6663><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has found out <S%H4672><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of your servants. <S%H5650><s%> Behold, <S%H113><s%> we are my lord's bondservants, <S%H5650><s%> both we, <S%H1571><s%> and he also in whose <S%H834><s%> hand the cup <S%H1375><s%> is found. <S%H4672><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Far be it <S%H2486><s%> from me that I should do <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H2063><s%> The man <S%H376><s%> in whose hand <S%H3027><s%> the cup <S%H1375><s%> is found, <S%H4672><s%> he will be my bondservant; <S%H5650><s%> but as for you, <S%H5927><s%> go up in peace <S%H7965><s%> to your father. <S%H1><s%>"

Then Judah <S%H3063><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> and said, "Oh, <S%H994><s%> my lord, <S%H113><s%> please let your servant <S%H5650><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in my lord <S%H113><s%>'s ears, <S%H241><s%> and don't <S%H639><s%> let your anger burn <S%H2734><s%> against your servant; <S%H5650><s%> for you are even as Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>
My lord <S%H113><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> his servants, <S%H5650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3426><s%> 'Have you a father, <S%H1><s%> or a brother? <S%H251><s%>'

We said <S%H559><s%> to my lord, <S%H113><s%> <S%H3426><s%> 'We have a father, <S%H1><s%> an old man, <S%H2205><s%> and a child <S%H3206><s%> of his old age, <S%H2208><s%> a little one; <S%H6996><s%> and his brother <S%H251><s%> is dead, <S%H4191><s%> and he alone is left <S%H3498><s%> of his mother; <S%H517><s%> and his father <S%H1><s%> loves him. <S%H157><s%>'
You said <S%H559><s%> to your servants, <S%H5650><s%> <S%H3381><s%> 'Bring him down to me, <S%H7760><s%> that I may set my eyes on him. <S%H5869><s%>'

We said <S%H559><s%> to my lord, <S%H113><s%> <S%H3201><s%> 'The boy can't leave <S%H5800><s%> his father: <S%H1><s%> for if he should leave <S%H5800><s%> his father, <S%H1><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> would die. <S%H4191><s%>'

You said <S%H559><s%> to your servants, <S%H5650><s%> <S%H3808><s%> 'Unless your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> comes down <S%H3381><s%> with you, <S%H3254><s%> you will see my face <S%H6440><s%> no more. <S%H7200><s%>'
It happened when we came up <S%H5927><s%> to your servant <S%H5650><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> we told <S%H5046><s%> him the words <S%H1697><s%> of my lord. <S%H113><s%>
Our father <S%H1><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7725><s%> 'Go again, buy <S%H7666><s%> us a little <S%H4592><s%> food. <S%H400><s%>'

We said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3201><s%> 'We can't go down. <S%H3381><s%> If our youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> is <S%H3426><s%> with us, <S%H3381><s%> then we will go down: for we may <S%H3201><s%> not see <S%H7200><s%> the man <S%H376><s%>'s face, <S%H6440><s%> unless <S%H369><s%> our youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother is with us. <S%H251><s%>'
Your servant, <S%H5650><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to us, <S%H3045><s%> 'You know that my wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> me two sons: <S%H8147><s%>
and the one <S%H259><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> from me, <S%H559><s%> and I said, "Surely <S%H2963><s%> he is torn in pieces; <S%H2963><s%>" and I haven't <S%H7200><s%> seen him since. <S%H2008><s%>

If you take <S%H3947><s%> this one also from <S%H5973><s%> me, <S%H6440><s%> and harm <S%H611><s%> happens to him, <S%H7136><s%> you will bring down <S%H3381><s%> my gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> with sorrow <S%H7451><s%> to Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>'

Now therefore when I come <S%H935><s%> to your servant <S%H5650><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and the boy <S%H5288><s%> is not with us; <S%H5315><s%> since his life is bound up <S%H7194><s%> in the boy <S%H5315><s%>'s life;

it will happen, <S%H7200><s%> when he sees that the boy <S%H5288><s%> is no more, <S%H4191><s%> that he will die. Your servants <S%H5650><s%> will bring down <S%H3381><s%> the gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> of your servant, <S%H5650><s%> our father, <S%H1><s%> with sorrow <S%H3015><s%> to Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>

For your servant <S%H5650><s%> became collateral <S%H6148><s%> for the boy <S%H5288><s%> to <S%H5973><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H935><s%> 'If I don't bring him to you, <S%H2398><s%> then I will bear the blame to my father <S%H1><s%> forever. <S%H3117><s%>'

Now therefore, <S%H5650><s%> please let your servant stay <S%H3427><s%> instead of the boy, <S%H5288><s%> a bondservant <S%H5650><s%> to my lord; <S%H113><s%> and let the boy <S%H5288><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> with his brothers. <S%H251><s%>

For how <S%H349><s%> will I go up <S%H5927><s%> to my father, <S%H1><s%> if the boy <S%H5288><s%> isn't <S%H7200><s%> with me?â€”lest I see the evil <S%H7451><s%> that will come on <S%H4672><s%> my father. <S%H1><s%>"
